result.reason: User requests right-click context menu on connection tree to include 'Connection Settings' option, currently only accessible via floating panel button.
result.approach: Add a 'Connection Settings' menu item to the connection tree context menu that focuses/opens the Config panel (connection properties) for the selected node.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is already triaged in the local JSON. The user wants right-click context menu on a connection tree node to include an option to open connection settings. This is a UI/UX enhancement request.
